ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-backup
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-backup
Language: hcl
Terraform module to provision AWS Backup, a fully managed backup service that makes it easy to centralize and automate the back up of data across AWS services such as EBS volumes, RDS databases, DynamoDB tables, EFS file systems, and AWS Storage Gateway volumes.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-dynamic-subnets
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-dynamic-subnets
Language: hcl
Terraform module for public and private subnets provisioning in existing VPC

ns0:entry.ns0:title: terraform-google-modules/terraform-google-kms
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
